about_the_game:
SPIN TO WIN: move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat in BubbleTabby's headspinning rhythm arcade game! Taps and different block types- like mines and sides- keep things fresh.

  • Groove your way through a variety of genres with both licensed and original tracks!

  • Visuals use a unique 3-bit palette system that has charm without distracting from gameplay.

  • A level editor to keep the fun going! Create to your heart's content. (Level editor is currently only available on Windows and Linux. Mac support is coming soon.)

  • Planned features include: more levels, block types, song unlocks, costumes, and level editor improvements.
detailed_description:
SPIN TO WIN: move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat in BubbleTabby's headspinning rhythm arcade game! Taps and different block types- like mines and sides- keep things fresh.

  • Groove your way through a variety of genres with both licensed and original tracks!

  • Visuals use a unique 3-bit palette system that has charm without distracting from gameplay.

  • A level editor to keep the fun going! Create to your heart's content. (Level editor is currently only available on Windows and Linux. Mac support is coming soon.)

  • Planned features include: more levels, block types, song unlocks, costumes, and level editor improvements.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ (or equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: good enough to dance to
  • Additional Notes: Current requirements are tentative, and may change as development continues.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel / Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: good enough to groove to
  • Additional Notes: Current requirements are tentative, and may change as development continues.

name: Beatblock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: good enough to jam to
  • Additional Notes: Current requirements are tentative, and may change as development continues.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: SPIN TO WIN, and move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat in an all-new simple but stylish rhythm-arcade experience!
